alert.note: Alert for Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 3:17PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY RAIN AND STRONG TO HIGH WIND POTENTIAL THROUGH MONDAY... A warm front will cause precipitation to track into the region from south to north early Friday. Winds out of the south with increased speeds will allow warming temperatures through the inner channels Friday. Meanwhile, snow/freezing levels will be steady around 4,000 feet, then top out at 5,000 to 6,000 feet Sunday. Rainfall totals over this 4 day period will vary as two or more surges of moisture move through, but are likely to reach 1-2 inches each day. Greatest rainfall totals are expected on Sunday. There is potential for strong wind gusts of over 40 mph with each surge of moisture and potentially gusts of around 60 mph Sunday night into Monday.

area.areaDesc: Annette Island; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Prince of Wales Island
